document.full_text: president barack obama set a goal on wednesday of cutting the u.s. budget deficit by $4 trillion over 12 years through spending cuts and tax increases on the rich and rejecting a republican plan as too radical.
document.title: obama sets deficit target, rips republican plan
lines_and_colors: president barack obama set a goal on wednesday of cutting the u.s. budget deficit by $4 trillion over 12 years through spending cuts and tax increases on the rich and rejecting a republican plan as too radical.
